description: Not much can compete with your all-around baselayer, especially when it's as soft as this. But often, even the best bases don't see beyond the shell of Mountain Hardwear's ski-wear... A versatile go-to for skinning up tracks at your local hill or pedaling the fat bike, this long-sleeve crew gets more mileage than its competition. Technical performance and active fit with a visual twist, it's the two-in-one solution you've been missing that'll eliminate your après change-out for good.
name: Mountain Hardwear Mountain Stretch LS - Mens
